parameters: \.\c[3]My diary.\.\. I write what happens everyday here.
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](I hesitate a bit before I eat the meal itself.)
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](Is it this really the right choice?)
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](I shut my eyes as I’m chewing.)
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](It just dawned on me that I’m eating a random ass meal
that might have a razor blade to save my life.)
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](I ask that as if anyone is watching.)
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](\c[10]Didn’t I just...put my life at risk?\c[1])
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](I skim the room one last time to see a large
\.\c[3]Or at least I think I did. Everything is so
dark, I can’t see a single thing.
\.\c[3]After sometime I feel my stomach go numb. After
that my legs, my arms... everything.
\.\c[3]My eyes got heavier. Maybe...\! maybe I
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[3]No, no, no, no..that couldn’t have happened...

\n<Ranmaru>\."....\!Is someone there?\| I know someone's there..."
\n<Girl in uniform>\."Can you even hear me?"
\n<Blue-haired man>\."Who the fuck are you guys?! What’s going on!?
\n<Hooded girl>\."Surely there’s someone here that can explain!"
\n<Woman in big hat>\."Everyone! Over there! Another person!"
\n<Pink-haired girl>\."A quick head count shows..\c[2]11 people.\c[0]"
\n<Man with glasses>\."I think you mean \c[2]10 people\c[0]..."
\n<Ranmaru>\."W-Where is this? Who are you people?"
\n<Striped man>\."As if we would be any more aware of the situation
\n<Striped man>\."Dare I say we’ve been kidnapped."
\n<Striped man>\."Agh! I must return, the warden’s going to extend my
\n<Man with glasses>\."M-Maybe we should all calm down! Screaming in this
\n<Woman in uniform>\."Alright, that's enough! Everyone listen up!\! Now!!"
\n<Striped man>\."Eek! S-so demanding... there’s no need to order us
\n<Woman in uniform>\."I just want everyone here to relax."
\n<Woman in uniform>\."You can’t really ask for that in a situation
\n<Woman in uniform>\."I get that it’s difficult, but we all have to stay
calm and assess the situation at hand."
\n<Woman in uniform>\."We’ve been abducted, simple as that.\!
And screaming at each other won’t get us out of here."
\n<Woman in uniform>\."How about this? Let’s give introductions to put our
\n<Blue-haired man>\."Like hell! You think I’m going to just spit
\n<Girl in uniform>\."Yeah! Shut up, old guy!"
\n<Blue-haired man>\."H-Hey, shut it! I’m not that old!"
\n<Man with glasses>\."Introductions don’t sound like a bad idea..."
\n<Woman in uniform>\."All I'm asking is for your \c[2]name and occupation\c[0].
